name: All Star Pro-Wrestling III
synopsis: All Star Pro-Wrestling III is the third and final title in Square's wrestling simulation series, featuring many famous wrestlers from the New Japan Pro Wrestling, Noah, and Zero-One wrestling promotions. There are once again numerous improvements over the previous game, including authentic entrances for each wrestler complete with original theme music, and a create-a-wrestler mode. All of the game modes from the previous release return, comprising single, tag, and battle royale matches in a variety of exhibition, tournament, and league modes.
